name: Some Skeletons (v2)
description:
THIS GAME IS IN ALPHA STATE / CURRENTLY STILL IN DEVELOPMENT (no sound/placeholder art)

Play as a skeleton in a dungeon--kill the heroes trying to escape! Fallen heroes turn into skeletons to fight for you.

Arcade-style gameplay where it gets harder and faster till you lose. Play with keyboard (mouse optional).

This is a small project I'm currently developing in Gamemaker for practice/experience. Please let me know if you find any bugs.
